name: Car Tuning Demolition Racing - DERBY8
description:
Choose between unlimited amount of tuning options. From body to engine to style!

Go on the track and challange your friends in multiplayer races or became the champion in singleplayer championship!
if you will become a legend your car could be choosed to appear on car tuning magazines cover! And you could be invited to special events designed for best drivers only!

DERBY8 is the next step in car demolition games. Are you ready?
